para.text: Unless prohibited by the organic rules, any action that may be taken by a board of directors may be taken without a meeting if each director consents in a record to the action.
Consent under subsection (a) of this section may be withdrawn by a director in a record at any time before the limited cooperative association receives consent from all directors.
A record of consent for any action under subsection (a) of this section may specify the effective date or time of the action.

annotations.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 812 of the Uniform Limited Cooperative Association Act. Edition
